DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study describe change intensity specific endometriosis symptom baseline pre-surgery surgery subsequent continuous Diphereline ( Triptorelin Acetate ) treatment 24 week .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Describe Efficacy Diphereline Following Conservative Surgery Deep Infiltrating Endometriosis ( DIE ) Patients Over Period 24 Months
DOC.criteria: Patients diagnose DIE receive surgery treatment within one month inclusion Premenopausal woman age > =18 year old . Patient treat physician already make decision treat Diphereline . Patient mentally physically able express symptom complaint answer question . Pregnancy lactation . Patients currently treatment therapy GnRHa last 6 month . Premenopausal woman may reach menopause within 3 year post randomisation . Hypersensitivity Triptorelin one excipients Triptorelin 3.75mg Treatment another research drug last 3 month study Potentially unreliable patient , judge investigator unsuitable study .
